WeaponTraitDef.label: Telescopic Stock
WeaponTraitDef.description: Adjustable retractable stock for improved ergonomics. A better fit allows for a more stable shooting stance and greater precision.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Buffering Stock
WeaponTraitDef.description: A tubular gunstock similar to an adjustable stock was adopted, with a buffer mechanism. During firing, the entire gun body would float and recoil within the gunstock, and the spring would buffer the recoil force of the weapon.
